Name: Tailwhip
Description: Deal 1 damage to exactly two enemies.

Name: Strike
Description: If you have played another action with your partner's icon today, deal 2 damage.

Name: Lash Out
Description: Deal 2 damage. If an enemy has been discarded this turn, deal 4 damage instead.

Name: Constrict
Description: Deal 2 damage. If you damage an enemy this way, also blank it until tomorrow.

Name: Consume
Description:
Draw all the cards in your partner's hand.
You and your partner forage.

Name: Encircle
Description: Deal 6 damage divided as you choose between one or two enemies.
